column1: Uchi////You really can't go wrong with the food no matter what you order. Everything is fresh
column3: and aesthetically pleasing. Some of my personal favorites include the walu walu
column5: and maguro sashimi and goat cheese. The brussel sprouts were really interesting and not bad at all
column6: but I wouldn't get them again. The tempura onion rings were also just ok. The fried milk dessert was very good and highly recommended!
